languages.text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never dodges them. Also, they suffer −50% less damage from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text:
当处于{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}中时，装备者对{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}会拥有100%掩体效果，但不会{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}范围攻击。此外，装备者承受的范围攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。
在每场战斗中，当装备者首次使用手雷至少{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}3名敌人时，此次动作不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
当处于{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}中时，装备者对{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}会拥有100%掩体效果，但不会闪避范围攻击。此外，装备者承受的范围攻击伤害降低50%。
在每场战斗中，当装备者首次使用手雷至少{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}3名敌人时，此次动作不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
При нахождении за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} его эффективность для персонажа при {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаках по области{/g} становится равна 100%. При этом персонаж не {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атак по области и получает от них на 50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Когда персонаж использует гранату и впервые за бой как минимум 3 противника одновременно получают от нее {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}, это действие не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
При нахождении за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} его эффективность для персонажа при {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаках по области{/g} становится равна 100%. При этом персонаж не уклоняется от атак по области и получает от них на 50% меньше урона.
Когда персонаж использует гранату и впервые за бой как минимум 3 противника одновременно получают от нее {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадания{/g}, это действие не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

При нахождении за {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} его эффективность для персонажа при {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаках по области{/g} становится равна 100%. При этом персонаж не уклоняется от атак по области и получает от них на 50% меньше урона.
Когда персонаж использует гранату и впервые за бой как минимум 3 противника одновременно получают от нее {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадания{/g}, это действие не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}の中にいる場合、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に対してカバー効率は100%であるが、それらを{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}することはできない。さらに、受ける範囲攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が50%軽減される。
使用者が手榴弾を使用し、それが戦闘で初めて一度に3体以上の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、このアクションでは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が消費されない。
languages.original_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}の中にいる場合、{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に対してカバー効率は100％であるが、それらを回避することはできない。さらに、受ける範囲攻撃のダメージが50％軽減される。
使用者が手榴弾を使用し、それが戦闘で初めて一度に3体以上の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した場合、このアクションでは{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が消費されない。

languages.text:
Si el portador está usando {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}, obtiene el 100 % de eficiencia de cobertura contra {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}, pero nunca los {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}. Además, sufre −50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} cuando recibe ataques de área.
Si el portador usa una granada e {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un mínimo de 3 enemigos a la vez por primera vez en combate, esta acción no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador está usando {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}, obtiene el 100 % de eficiencia de cobertura contra {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}, pero nunca los esquiva. Además, sufre −50 % de daño cuando recibe ataques de área.
Si el portador usa una granada e {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un mínimo de 3 enemigos a la vez por primera vez en combate, esta acción no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text:
Ist er in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}, hat der Träger 100 % Deckungseffizienz gegen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht{/g} ihnen aber nie aus. Außerdem erleidet er −50 % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch Flächenangriffe.
Wenn der Träger eine Granate benutzt und diese mindestens 3 Feinde gleichzeitig erstmals im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, verbraucht diese Aktion keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Ist er in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g}, hat der Träger 100 % Deckungseffizienz gegen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}, weicht ihnen aber nie aus. Außerdem erleidet er -50 % weniger Schaden durch Flächenangriffe.
Immer wenn der Träger eine Granate benutzt und sie mindestens 3 Feinde gleichzeitig zum ersten Mal im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, verbraucht diese Aktion keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text:
Lorsqu'il est à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvert{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie d'une efficacité de couverture de 100 % contre les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}, mais ne les {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jamais. De plus, il subit 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins lors des attaques de zone.
Lorsque l'utilisateur lance une grenade et que celle-ci {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} au moins 3 ennemis simultanément pour la première fois du combat, cette action ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsqu'il est à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvert{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie d'une efficacité de couverture de 100 % contre les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} mais ne les esquive jamais. De plus, il subit -50 % de dégâts en moins lors des attaques de zone.
Lorsque l'utilisateur lance une grenade et que celle-ci {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} au moins 3 ennemis simultanément pour la première fois du combat, cette action ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

Lorsqu'il est à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvert{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie d'une efficacité de couverture de 100 % contre les {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} mais ne les esquive jamais. De plus, il subit -50 % de dégâts en moins lors des attaques de zone.
Lorsque l'utilisateur lance une grenade et que celle-ci {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} au moins 3 ennemis simultanément pour la première fois du combat, cette action ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text:
Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperdeyken{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarına{/g} karşı siper etkililiği %100'dür ancak onlardan asla {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınamaz{/g}. Ayrıca alan saldırılarından %50 daha az {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırlar.
Giyen kişi bir bomba kullanarak çatışmada ilk kez aynı anda 3 düşmanı birden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g}, bu eylem hiç {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcamaz.
languages.original_text:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
